Text: i know alot of people dont say thank you but i really appreciate these uploads.  i watch all 5 episodes at work on sundays so keep up the good work

No need to apologise for the file size. If it was a gig in size I doubt that people would complain. Ask a few tricky questions, perhaps...

Thanks again.
